Notes.Text:
This update for webkit2gtk3 fixes the following issues:

Update to version 2.44.3 (bsc#1228696 bsc#1228697 bsc#1228698):

- Fix web process cache suspend/resume when sandbox is enabled.
- Fix accelerated images dissapearing after scrolling.
- Fix video flickering with DMA-BUF sink.
- Fix pointer lock on X11.
- Fix movement delta on mouse events in GTK3.
- Undeprecate console message API and make it available in 2022 API.
- Fix several crashes and rendering issues.
- Security fixes: CVE-2024-40776, CVE-2024-40779, CVE-2024-40780,
  CVE-2023-40782, CVE-2024-40785, CVE-2024-40789, CVE-2024-40794,
  CVE-2024-4558.
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management. This issue is fixed in iOS 16.7.9 and iPadOS 16.7.9, Safari 17.6, iOS 17.6 and iPadOS 17.6, watchOS 10.6, tvOS 17.6, visionOS 1.3, macOS Sonoma 14.6. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to an unexpected process crash.
